sentences.en: A scaffold, by contrast, mimics the structure of a healthy tendon.
sentences.cn: 相比之下, 支架则会模仿健康肌腱的构造.

sentences.en: Are all scaffold legs braced with braces properly attached?
sentences.cn: 所有的脚手架支柱都用所附的拉撑件正确拉撑了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ascending the shaky ladder to the scaffold, More addressed the executioner.
sentences.cn: 摩尔沿着摇摇晃晃的梯子登上绞刑台，跟行刑人说了话。

sentences.en: Conclusion The absorbable coral hydroxyapatite is a good bone tissue engineering scaffold.
sentences.cn: 结论可吸收性珊瑚羟基磷灰石具有促进骨髓基质细胞表达成骨细胞表型、合成细胞外基质的功能,是良好的细胞载体.

sentences.en: Double scaffold outside the structure will be built by scaffolding company.
sentences.cn: 1框架外的双排脚手架由架业公司搭设.

sentences.en: Fix and tighten the scaffold board and establish protective handrail timely.
sentences.cn: 脚手架搭设过程中和在管架上行走必须将安全带扣在设置好的横杆或生命线上.

sentences.en: He mounted the tumbril with him , he mounted the scaffold with him.
sentences.cn: 他和他一同上囚车,一同上断头台.

sentences.en: He turned towards the scaffold, and stretched forth his arms.
sentences.cn: 他转向刑台, 向前伸出双臂.

sentences.en: If I quit you, it will only be to go to the scaffold.
sentences.cn: 我一离开你, 就只能上断头台了.

sentences.en: It is no house but the scaffold for furnishings.
sentences.cn: 用来装修仅仅是脚手架而不是房子.

sentences.en: Moore ascended the scaffold and addressed the executioner.
sentences.cn: 穆尔走上断头台，和刽子手说话。

sentences.en: The design and calculation of the scaffold's control system.
The men on the scaffold turned about and drank to our healths.
sentences.cn: 脚手架上的工人也转过身来为我们的健康干杯.

sentences.en: The scaffold were believed to have curative powers.
sentences.cn: 人们认为绞刑架具有治病的功效.

sentences.en: Then, down he sank upon the scaffold!
sentences.cn: 随后, 他就瘫倒在刑台上了!

words.tran_cn: 脚手架；搭脚手架的材料

trans.tran_en: a structure built next to a wall, for workers to stand on while they build, repair, or paint a building

trans.tran_cn: 给…搭脚手架；用支架支撑
